Pre-Game Insights: Dallas comes into the matchup with Memphis after losing four games in a row.
Memphis ranks second in the NBA with 30.5 assists per game led by Desmond Bane averaging 5.2.
The Mavericks are 4-2 against the rest of the division. Dallas ranks fourth in the Western Conference shooting 37.3% from 3-point range.

The Grizzlies average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.2 more made shots on average than the 12.9 per game the Mavericks give up. The Mavericks average 13.3 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.3 fewer makes per game than the Grizzlies allow.
Jaren Jackson Jr. is averaging 22.3 points, 6.2 rebounds and 1.6 blocks for the Grizzlies.
Kyrie Irving is averaging 24.3 points and 4.9 assists for the Mavericks.
The Grizzlies are 2-2 against Southwest Division teams. Memphis ranks second in the NBA with 30.5 assists per game led by Desmond Bane averaging 5.2.
The Mavericks are 4-2 against the rest of the division. Dallas ranks fourth in the Western Conference shooting 37.3% from 3-point range.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is set to take place in Memphis, Tennessee, at 8 p.m. EST.
